game.name: TS Marketplace: Baltimore & Ohio RF-16 Livery Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: American railroading of the memorable early diesel era comes alive with the iconic Baldwin RF-16 “Sharknose” diesel in the classic livery of the historic Baltimore & Ohio.
game.shortDescriptionEn: American railroading of the memorable early diesel era comes alive with the iconic Baldwin RF-16 “Sharknose” diesel in the classic livery of the historic Baltimore & Ohio.
